thread.title: Elderly Vic sex offender loses appeal
thread.title_full: Elderly Vic sex offender loses appeal

title: Elderly Vic sex offender loses appeal
text:
Share Elderly Vic sex offender loses appeal - Yahoo7 An elderly Victorian who pleaded guilty to historical child sex offences has tried to have his jail sentence cut because he does not have long to live. 
Howard Edward Burgess, 83, was sentenced to at least six years' imprisonment in 2016 after pleading guilty to 10 counts of historical sexual abuse from the late 1980s and early 1990s. 
Burgess appealed against his sentence and argued it was "crushing" given his advanced age, but the Court of Appeal on Friday found the sentence was not excessive even if Burgess could die in jail.
